mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.status, s.step, s.total_amount, s.user_id, u.name AS user_name, s.approver_id, s.created_date, s.updated_date FROM slips s JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.status = 0;

SELECT s.id, s.status, s.step, s.total_amount, s.user_id, u.name AS user_name, s.approver_id, s.created_date, s.updated_date FROM slips s JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.status = 1;
SELECT id, status, step, total_amount, user_id, approver_id, created_date FROM slips ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM slips WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY updated_date DESC
